00031 // Lecture du Champ a partir d'un flot d'entree (On ne sait traiter que les champs scalaires.)
00032 Entree& Champ_Fonc_Fonction_txyz::readOn(Entree& is)
00033 {
00034   int nbcomp, nbcomp_tmp_ = -1, old_table_syntax_ = 0;
00035   Nom val1, val2;
00036   is >> val1;
00037   is >> val2;
00038 // fix if user uses the old syntax ..
00039   Champ_Fonc_Tabule::Warn_old_chp_fonc_syntax_V_184("Champ_Fonc_Fonction_txyz", val2, nbcomp_tmp_, old_table_syntax_);
00040   if (old_table_syntax_)
00041     {
00042       noms_champs_parametre_.add(val1);
00043       nbcomp = nbcomp_tmp_;
00044     }
00045   else
00046     {
00047       noms_pbs_.add(val1);
00048       noms_champs_parametre_.add(val2);
00049       is >> nbcomp;
00050     }
00051 
00052   if(nbcomp==1)
00053     {
00054       fixer_nb_comp(nbcomp);
00055       la_table.lire_fxyzt(is,nbcomp);
00056     }
00057   else
00058     {
00059       Cerr << "Error reading from an object of type Champ_Fonc_Fonction_txyz" << finl;
00060       Cerr << "We know treating only the scalar fields " << finl;
00061       Process::exit();
00062     }
00063   return is;
00064 }
